name: Astellas Pharma Europe Limited
goal: Providing high quality medicines in areas of high unmet medical need
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, General and Institutional Affairs, Public Health, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: All relevant pharmaceutical and health care initiatives, including Falsified Medicines Directive, Organ supply Directive, European Commission Incentives Review, Member State collaboration in the area of medicines pricing, EUnetHTA, orphan disease legislation, European Medicines Agency and regulatory policy, etc.
